name: Coffee Kiss
description:
Story:

When I learned that my roommate was going to meet with a netizen soon, I suddenly realized that I had fallen in love with her for a long time. Shall I stop her or be her guardian angel? Were there any other options?

After playing, you can fill out the feedback form to get hidden plot clues: https://forms.gle/ZH8o8kNGTqTbVyLY6

How to play:
1. Use the mouse to click items in the room and choose among the options.
2. Press Esc to return to the title screen if you already started the game.

Feedback Form:
Welcome to fill out the feedback form:
https://forms.gle/ZH8o8kNGTqTbVyLY6

Others:

Languages Available:     English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
Game Features:                 Sketching Styles
Game Length:                     about 5 to 10 minutes
Game Rating System:    Restricted to persons 15 years or over (R15)
Number of Endings:        3 endings + 1 hidden plot
Development Time:        9 days
